entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58141
    area-Setup
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #58139
    untriaged
  • STJ Source Generator generates invalid code with value tuples #58137
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • STJ Source Generator bloats the assembly when used with records #58136
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • STJ Source Generator fails to do polymorphic serialization for built-in types #58134
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: add Except for single item to Linq #58132
    api-suggestion, area-System.Linq, untriaged
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http undoc APIs #58131
    documentation, untriaged, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • Microsoft.Extensions undoc APIs (more) #58128
    documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 7.0.0
  • Tracking issue for Core Runtime HouseKeeping Items #58120
    area-Meta, tracking, 7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json code generator: custom converter ignored? #58119
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • System.Text.Json code generator: cannot convert from 'System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonWriter' to 'System.IO.Stream' #58118
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • Exception in HttpClient: Error while copying content to a stream, Unable to read data from the transport connection: Broken pipe #58117
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, Future
  • [ios][mono][JIT] Are there any plan to allow dotnet full support / JIT / non-AOT on ios? #58115
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, os-ios
  • iOS: LLVM fails for ios-arm #58112
    untriaged, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [MacOS] EXC_CRASH (SIGABRT) when GC occurs from within a callback made out of an Dispatch queue: com.apple.root.default-qos thread #58111
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Tests which depend on the host don't use a live built version #58109
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationExtensions.Exists() returns false in cases where true would be expected #58104
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [System.Linq] Performance: .ToList() counter-intuitively slower than .ToArray() #58100
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • Failed Assembly.Load and Assembly.LoadFile leaks memory #58093
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\interlocked\\compareexchange\\CompareExchangeTString\\CompareExchangeTString.cmd #58090
    arch-x86, area-System.Threading, os-windows, untriaged
  • HTTP/3: SocketsHttpHandler.PlaintextStreamFilter #58089
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged

Closed

  • [ Hot Reload / EnC ] A newly added Type will not be returned from Type.GetType or Assembly.GetType (they return null) #57972
    area-System.Reflection
  • Failed to execute OSPlatform.get_Linux() on macOS 12 using dotnet 3.1 #56725
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, needs more info, Future
  • Generate workload msis in parallel #57523
    area-Setup
  • [Android] Missing `TimeZoneInfo` information #58130
    blocking-release, os-android, 6.0.0
  • [android] $(EnableLLVM) started failing in .NET 6 rc1 #57800
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.0
  • System.Text.Json source generator does not handle reference types with design time custom converter properly #56864
    area-System.Text.Json, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ConstructorTests_Stream.PathForChildDictionaryFails #39055
    bug, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Hot reload breaks child process starts #58000
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, untriaged, 6.0.0
  • System.Text.Json code generator generates invalid code when Json property contains a dash #57836
    bug, area-System.Text.Json, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • Dump generation for the server GC apps failure #57960
    area-System.Diagnostics, 6.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices Test Failures on Android x86 #49872
    os-android, runtime-mono, area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_56953\\Runtime_56953\\Runtime_56953.cmd #58091
    arch-x86, os-windows, GCStress, arch-x64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged
  • Crash in Profiler API on Linux #56902
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • TestWithRelativePaths, TestWithAbsolutePaths, and TestWithRelativePathsDirSeparator installer tests failed in CI #55918
    area-HostModel, untriaged
  • System.Text.Json 5.x preview deserialization is slower than Newtonsoft when using Stream scenarios on Xamarin platforms #41089
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Bug: DebuggerDisplay in Blazor has problems with special characters (umlauts) #58046
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Empty string custom arg values should use string.Empty #58022
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [HTTP/3] New case of "The server returned an invalid or unrecognized response" #57647
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Backporting fixes to Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder v3.1.x? #58103
    untriaged, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Http server performance regression in net6 preview 7 #57656
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, tenet-performance, 6.0.0
  • Console.WriteLine throw FormatException when print json string #58098
    area-System.Console, customer assistance
  • Add SetDatetime() #26311
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, Future
  • Debugger incorrectly resolves argument in MethodImplOptions.NoOptimization frame in Windows x86 #57951
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix type of cast node generated by box import #10843
    up-for-grabs, area-CodeGen-coreclr, optimization, JitUntriaged, Future

Updated

  • JIT: Assertion failed '(constIndOffset % elemSize) == 0' #57856
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-linux, JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [wasm] Require wasm workload, if a native reference is being used #56678
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, in pr, 6.0.0

    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, GCStress, JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Recurring test failures in tracing due to class loader alloc tracker heap corruption #57461

  • atom10itemformattertests.writeto_emptyitem_serializesexpected fails in CI #57375

  • Feed unreliability affecting CI #55449

    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, blocking-clean-ci, 7.0.0

    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, test bug, test-run-core, 7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58148
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • Remove NDIRECTSTUB_FL_NGENEDSTUB (never set) #58146
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Handle shadowed property names in DiagnosticsSourceEventSource #58145
    area-System.Diagnostics, 6.0.0
  • Minor R2RTest improvements #58144
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Crossgen2 symbol files to package #58143
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • PhysicalFileProvider: Use active polling instead of FileSystemWatcher on iOS/tvOS #58142
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Stop compiling armel variant of standalone jit as the unix arm jit covers that scenario #58140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/icu #58138
  • Enable Single File testing on all libraries test projects #58135
    area-Single-File
  • Fail early on CMake check failure when building coreclr #58133
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [mono] Avoid a JIT assert. #58127
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove MethodDesc::IsRestored (always true) #58126
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Surface allocations per thread #58123
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Conditionally build allconfigurations in source-build #58122
  • [mono] Fix a few corner case overflow operations #58114
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use string.Empty for empty string custom arg values #58113
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Stress] Enable POST by disabling InternalServerError suppression #58110
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [main] Update dependencies from dnceng/internal/dotnet-optimization dotnet/arcade dotnet/hotreload-utils dotnet/xharness #58107
  • WIP: Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Prevent AV in processinfo2 while suspended on Mono. #58099
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Share compiler configurations across libs & coreclr #58096
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-rc1] X86 Debug Stack offsets are encoded divided by 4 #58094

  • Remove two async state machines for typical HTTP/1.1 request path #58092
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 6.0.0
  • add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58088
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0

Merged

Updated

  • Make JsonGenerator be an incremental generator #57088
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add internal junction support to link APIs #57996
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Clean-up duplicated PathInternal files #57988
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0

    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 6.0.0

    area-DependencyModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0

    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime
  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] spread WS based timers over next 6 minutes to prevent heavy throttling #57745
